sentences.sContent: A design flaw (= a mistake or weakness in the way something was made ) caused the engine to explode.
sentences.sCn: 一个设计缺陷导致了引擎爆炸。

synos.tran: 瑕疵，裂纹；缺点；一阵狂风
使无效；使破裂，使有缺陷

phrases.pCn: 缺陷回波；缺陷的回波信号；缺陷回声

words.tran: 完美的；无瑕疵的；无裂缝的

trans.tranCn: 瑕疵，缺点；一阵狂风；短暂的风暴；裂缝，裂纹
trans.tranOther: a mistake, mark, or weakness that makes something imperfect

trans.tranCn: 使生裂缝，使有裂纹；使无效；使有缺陷
trans.tranOther: to make or become blemished, defective, or imperfect
